name: Elvia Brock
review: I honestly feel like this was a knock off. Really good packaging, but the actual item is a rip off. Never buying brand electronics from headphone bazar.

name: Barry Hansen
review: Bought this for my son’s birthday and we happened to be in a mall where there was Apple store. He compared this one to the same product in the store and the sound quality was evident.

name: Molly Perry
review: Sound is decent, though I agree with other reviewer that the bass is pretty poor and nothing spectacular. However the worst part is the design.

name: Nieves Daniels
review: Overall the sound is not that great for the price, there are better alternatives. That said the worst part is I use my Samsung Galaxy phone with these.

name: Brianna Bauer
review: I’ve had them for less than a week and they’ve already stopped working. They’ll charge, but you can’t turn them on/reset them.

name: Krista Hodges
review: I was actually excited to receive these headphones after using my wife's Solo3 Beats headphones. Her's was super loud and had really good bass.
